citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 pm on
Wednesday, December 17, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by telephone (left a message) and at
the residence. Painters were at the facility and said that the previous resident had moved. Later, the licensee returned the
call and said that she had retired from regulated activity and had moved. She was instructed to cancel her license in
writing and was given the e-mail address to do so. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 pm on 
Wednesday, December 17, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by telephone (left a message) and at 
the residence. Painters were at the facility and said that the previous resident had moved. Later, the licensee returned the 
call and said that she had retired from regulated activity and had moved. She was instructed to cancel her license in 
writing and was given the e-mail address to do so. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
